title: UNESCO Global Declaration on Information Ethics

contentBlocks.excerpt: Information ethics is rooted in the respect for human dignity, autonomy, and the right of all people to access, create, share, and benefit from information and knowledge.
contentBlocks.rationale: Defines ethical standards for digital and global information systems, rooted in access and equity.
contentBlocks.notes: Framing document for global information justice in the 21st century.
